body.name: N300 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Free-Stand, Up to 40mins Runtime, Powerful Vacuum for Hard Floor Carpet Pet Hair Home
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 40 mins
features: 💎One Sentence Summary of Devoac N300 : A Low-cost cordless vacuum cleaner that has surprising performance. Fits most families for daily household cleaning.

【Surprising Powerful Suction with 2 Modes】- This cordless stick vacuum cleaner features a powerful 175W motor, which provides impressive powerful suction. It can be switched into two modes: Max Mode (20KPa for 25mins), and Standard Mode (15KPa for 40mins). So it can easily capture pet hair, dust, debris, crumbs, pet food, and other messes with ease. Suitable for tasks on the hardwood floor, low-pile carpet, stairs, curtains, furniture, car, etc.

【Large Battery Capacity & Long Runtime】- Our cordless vacuum cleaner adopts a 2200mAh 6-cell rechargeable battery, delivers up to 40 minutes uninterrupted runtime in min mode and 25 minutes runtime in standard mode. It performs well in cleaning stairs, rooms, dorms and all around your house.

【Free-Standing & Lightweight】- Our Devoac N300 cordless vacuum cleaner can be free to stand anywhere you want. It weighs less then 3.9lbs. The main motor of the vacuum cleaner weighs only 2.2lbs! You can easily pick it up to clean your house. With a labor-saving battery vacuum cleaner, you can get more out of your time and your arms won't be sore anymore.

【6 in 1 Multi-function Vacuum】- With an upgraded motorized floor brush, long crevice, and 2-in-1 brush, the pet hair vacuum cleaner can be quickly converted into a portable handheld vacuum or a cordless stick vacuum lightweight. These accessories help clean up debris in the hard-to-reach place. The retractable metal tube is perfect for cleaning pet hair on the curtains or ceiling. The wall mount effectively holds the cordless vacuum cleaner and saves space.

【High-Efficiency Filtration System】- With 5-stage cyclone technology and high-density meshing, the cordless stick vacuum cleaner can capture 99.99% of microscopic dust particles as small as 0.1 microns. Thus, it effectively makes the exhaust air cleaner, prevents secondary air pollution, and brings cleaner air to the family. The "One-Button Dust Dumping" design makes emptying simple.
【Warranty】- DEVOAC provides 12-Month warranty service. Our professional team will provide you with the state of the art service for any of your queries. No worry about any after-sales problems!

V-Shape Roller The V-shape hard-bristled roller can effectively gather dust, pet hair, debris and cat litters, which could reduce hair tangled problems. One Click Empty Just one click of the button under the dustbin to empty the trash to avoid getting your hands dirty. Note: Please regularly replace the filter pads. Retractable Metal Tube The height of the stick vacuum can be adjusted from 31.5 inches to 41.4 inches. With 3-versatile attachments, you can easily clean all corners. Easy to Charge 5-hour Quick Charge. You can charge the whole vacuum directly or charge the main motor seperately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little sweeper
reviews.reviewText: I really like this sweeper. It is very light andpowerful. We just got it but works well on hard wood floors and carpeting. It nice fir a fast clean up. The only thing I dislike is the cleaning head could be heavier. I find it popping up while sweeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy use and set up
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and set up! It consolidates into a smaller neck, so you can store it in smaller spaces. Light and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cordless stick vac is EXACTLY what I needed to combat the dog hair situation in my home. I have a white cattle dog and dark hardwood floors. This little vac is perfect for daily cleanings. It's very light and has powerful suction. I actually enjoy zipping around the house cleaning more quickly than if I were teathered to the wall with my bulky conventional vacuum. At this price point you can't go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum was given as a gift . The recipient said it was easy to put together and worked really well. He liked that it could also be used to vacuum the car when you remove the top part. It is light weight and easy to store. Very nifty that it has no cord to bother with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of power
reviews.reviewText: Great cordless vacuum. Lots of power. Easy to operate. The light is a wonderful idea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and great suction power!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm really happy with this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I clean air bnbs and having a good vacuum is a must! This vacuum has been amazing so far! Light weight and very efficient! It works so well! I empty it after every use and I clean out the bottom with the little tool it comes with. I really hope this lasts and continues to work well overtime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very strong auction and yet lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I used it right out of the box and the powerful suction on my hardwood floors was amazing. It is easy to empty and very lightweight. I do however wish the on and off button were in a different place because I kept accidentally turning it off. That really does need to be fixed. But I can live with it since it’s so powerful. I have two long hair cats and this tackled it phenomenally on the hard wood floors.
